projects.title: Jixifood
keyResponsibilities: Developed and maintained a backend server using a **microservice architecture** and the **Gateway pattern**, ensuring scalable and modular service interactions.
Applied **dependency injection** in Go to manage service dependencies, improving code modularity, maintainability, and testability.
Implemented **gRPC** for efficient communication across services and **gRPC bidirectional streams** for real-time order tracking.

Ensured **eventual consistency** across the system by integrating **RabbitMQ** for message queuing and reliable communication.

Containerized the application using **Docker** and orchestrated deployments with **Kubernetes**, ensuring scalability and seamless management.
